mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRANSACTION(wishListNo, prodNo, userId,period) values (#{wishListNo},#{prodNo},#{userId},#{period})
mapper.select: SELECT WISHLIST.*, (PRODUCT.QUANTITY-NVL(A.SUM,0)) remain, PRODUCT.PRICE, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME FROM WISHLIST LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT ON WISHLIST.PROD_NO = PRODUCT.PROD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROD_NO, SUM(purchaseQt) SUM FROM TRANSACTION GROUP BY prod_no) A ON WISHLIST.PROD_NO = A.PROD_NO WHERE wish_no = #{wishNo}

SELECT WISHLIST.*, (PRODUCT.QUANTITY-NVL(A.SUM,0)) remain, PRODUCT.PRICE, PRODUCT.PROD_NAME FROM WISHLIST LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT ON WISHLIST.PROD_NO = PRODUCT.PROD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROD_NO, SUM(purchaseQt) SUM FROM TRANSACTION GROUP BY prod_no) A ON WISHLIST.PROD_NO = A.PROD_NO where user_id = #{userId}
